name: fast-code-search
description: High-performance code search powered by fast_code_search server (trigram indexing + optional semantic search)

fastCodeSearch.keywordServer.host.description: Hostname of the fast_code_search keyword server.

fastCodeSearch.keywordServer.port.description: Port of the fast_code_search keyword server.

fastCodeSearch.semanticServer.enabled.description: Enable semantic search via the semantic server.

fastCodeSearch.semanticServer.host.description: Hostname of the fast_code_search semantic server.

fastCodeSearch.semanticServer.port.description: Port of the fast_code_search semantic server.

fastCodeSearch.preferSemanticSearch.description: Deprecated: semantic search is now always available via the AITextSearchProvider when the semantic server is enabled.
fastCodeSearch.preferSemanticSearch.deprecationMessage: No longer used. Semantic search results are always shown in the 'AI Results' section of the Search panel when fastCodeSearch.semanticServer.enabled is true.

fastCodeSearch.maxResults.description: Maximum number of search results to return.

fastCodeSearch.symbolsOnly.description: Search only in symbol definitions (functions, classes).

fastCodeSearch.autoStartServer.description: Automatically download (if needed) and start the fast_code_search server when VSCode opens a workspace. Disable this if you prefer to manage the server process yourself.

fastCodeSearch.serverVersion.description: Version of the fast_code_search server binary to download. Use 'latest' to always fetch the newest release, or pin to a specific tag such as 'v0.2.0'.

fastCodeSearch.serverBinaryPath.description: Absolute path to an existing fast_code_search_server binary. When set, the extension uses this binary instead of downloading one automatically.
